General.Name: Zhejiang Zhongcheng Packing Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Zhongcheng Packing Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, production, sale, and after sale servicing of shrink films. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Jiashan, China.

1.Name: Mr. Yueqiang  Zhan
1.Title: Chief Technologist of the Process Technology Department & Director
